description: A service class for managing local notifications in a Flutter application, utilizing the flutter_local_notifications plugin and timezone package for scheduling and handling notifications across platforms.

classes.name: NotificationService
classes.description: Singleton service for managing local notifications within a Flutter application.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes timezone data, configures notification settings for Android and iOS, and requests necessary permissions.

methods.name: scheduleNotification
methods.description: Schedules a local notification to trigger at a specified date and time.

methods.name: cancelNotification
methods.description: Cancels a scheduled notification by its ID.
